data.title: Academic Honors
data.text:
Swanson School Academic Honors

Recognizing Our Outstanding Students

Please join us in congratulating our students for earning academic honors. The Swanson School recognizes both Term Honors and Dean’s Honors.

To be eligible for the Term Honor List, a student must earn a GPA of at least 3.250, complete a minimum of 15 credits of academic work for letter grades at the University of Pittsburgh, and complete a minimum of 6 credits of work for letter grades in the term of eligibility.

To be eligible for the Dean’s Honor List, a student must earn cumulative and term GPAs of 3.250 or higher, complete a minimum of 30 credits of academic work for letter grades at the University of Pittsburgh, and complete a minimum of 6 credits of work for letter grades in the term of eligibility.

All of the students listed here are on the Term Honor Lists; students with an asterisk (*) next to their name are on both the Term Honors List and Dean’s Honor List.
